reviews.review: If you are hardcore fan of Marvel movies, you will love this movie, if you are not then you might be disappointed.  The movie itself is amazing, from the beginning to the end, and it finish in great to set up for the Avengers 4.
Drew from a lot of the other Marvel movies and combined in an interesting way. Also, my wife who has seen fewer of the Marvel movies still enjoyed it.

... and they hit it out of the park!!! The crowd goes wild!! - Definitely my all-time favorite MCU movie. I can say with great certainty that I will be watching the movie for the 15th time over the weekend. Combining the big names who have made the Marvel Cinematic Universe the juggernaut it's become in the past decade, the Russo brothers have once more delivered the thrills, comedy, and drama of a massive superhero film. The visuals are absolutely OUTSTANDING. Shout out to a global team of 2D, 3D artists & VFx studios who had a hand in the movie's success. Definitely part of the reason I signed up for Disney+ on day-1.

La mejor de Avengers (no de marvel, pq la mejor es X-Men Days of future past). Genial el  Thanos. Buena acción y entretenida para lo larga. Sorprendente como ensamblan tanto personajes en diferentes planetas y situaciones sin verse absurdo (parece starwars por momentos). Lo Malo el final, a lo fácil matar a lo bestia (parece q lo hacen para ahorrar en salarios de actores), y va ser pésimo y estúpido si los reviven a todos y fingen que nunca paso nada, tipo LOST y Dragon Ball. Todavía voy  a ver q Thanos se vuelva bueno.

The beginning of the culmination of 10 years of the ONLY successful Cinematic Universe that brought together more than 60 well known characters from an array of vast genres...And they did it right!

There were a very few shortcuts taken, and  some tropes were glaring, but these criticisms are a drop in the Bucket compared to the sheer awesome spectacle that the rest of the movie was. No character in this vast array acts out of character.

This is how big budget spectacles should be made. It should give an impression that the creative side was forefront to the corporate side of making movies, which is where all the other failed CUs falter.

Saw it once, will definitely go see it again...And again...

What a depressing but amazing movie. From womb to tomb. From ash we cometh, and to ash we return. It looks like infinity is preparing humanity for an apocalypse of Armageddon portions. What a coincidence that I see it the day of the peace treaty of Korea.
The best marvel movie out of them all, and completely unexpected. The trailers completely trolled everyone.

Loved this through and through.  This is an amazing take on the Infinity Gauntlet / Infinity Wars books.  While I can see people not quite getting this, or liking this movie. I believe that those not enjoying the experience are not the true comic fans and only know / understand the MCU for what they see on film.  

This had great tie ins from the original source material.  Building toward that finger snap and ending the movie was pretty much my expectation all along. 

My one criticism would be that the deaths in this movie don't feel as painful as perhaps they should.  That is also likely because there is SO much death in this movie in general.   At the same time there probably won't be any characters completely dead by the time the next Avengers film concludes as I fully expect this time line to be erased as it is in the Infinity Gauntlet books.

A Grand Entertainment!! How many times you get to see a superhero movie like that , I suppose none ( may be infinity war-2)

Epic Intense Battle , Great Humour , Nicely Balanced with a Heart-stomping Ending which will leave a long lasting impact on you!!

Best Villain of the MCU yet.

Never seen Hall-Audience getting amazed cherishing their super-heroes all-together in such a way and even getting staggered n thunder-struck on shocking wtf moments this movie has.
Didn't see a single person leaving their seats when the movie ends , infact everyone looking at each other's face with astonishment  and waiting for the post end-crdit to roll up. 
That's the Beauty of it!!!
